BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution establishing February 4 as Rosa Parks Day to commemorate the Civil Rights leader.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a Rosa Parks Day to commemorate the Civil Rights leader.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Secretary of the Interior to recognize the historical significance of Roberto Clemente’s place of death in Loíza, Puerto Rico, by adding it to the National Register of Historic Places.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: US Secretary of the Interior to recognize the historical significance of Roberto Clemente’s place of death in Loíza, Puerto Rico, by adding it to the National Register of Historic Places.
